name: oneMapToRuleThemAll
description: Unique interface above multiple map providers

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && webpack -p && find dist/ -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type f -name '*.js' | sed 's/.js$//' | xargs -I{} mv {}.js {}.min.js && webpack
scripts.gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages

author: Damien Pellier
